description:
This proof documents a pre-planting quality selection process at MaMeeFarmâ„¢.

At 11:18 on 27 December 2025, MaMee carefully sorted shallot bulbs in preparation for planting a new plot.
Bulbs showing signs of rot, dehydration, or weakness were identified and discarded, while healthy bulbs were retained for cultivation.

This activity records an essential agricultural decision-making stepâ€”quality control before plantingâ€”ensuring soil, labor, and resources are used efficiently.
The process is captured under the DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) framework as verifiable real-world work.
